column1: This spreadsheet is part of ODILeeds' work on mapping the UK Data Landscape and its players. This is done in collaboration with The Open Data Institute and The Data City.
This list of organisations is based on Gavin Freeguard's Data Government Ecosystem which was community reviewed and added to in an ODILeeds open session.
